DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Gemtuzumab Ozogamicin Acute Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.criteria: Morphologic diagnosis AML bone marrow aspirate biopsy Flow cytometry , perform study site , must demonstrate patient AML CD33+ , base local laboratory criterion Age 18 year old relapse refractory patient Phase I study Patients de novo AML M3 subtype AML follow antecedent hematologic disorder ( myelodysplasia myeloproliferation ) > 2 month duration AML secondary exposure chemotherapy radiation
